summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackHSA/FSA eligibleClarins' Extra-Firming & Smoothing Day Moisturizer SPF 15 visibly firms, lifts, and fights wrinkles.
details: DetailsBenefitsSmoothes the appearance of lines and wrinklesBoosts skins radianceBlends natural botanicals from around the world (6 of which are organic)Key IngredientsKangaroo Flower Extract and Organic Mitracarpus: visibly boost elasticity and firmnessOrganic Oat Sugars: visibly lift, firm and smoothAcerola Seed Extract: enhances radianceOrganic Desert Date Extract: targets dark spots to even skin toneAnti-Pollution Complex: shields skin against environmental aggressorsResearch Results91% skin looks visibly regenerated*89% skin looks visibly firmer*87% skin looks visibly tighter**Satisfaction test - 107 women using Extra-Firming Day and Extra-Firming Night - 14 daysItem 2520383How To UseApply each morning after Serum using the Clarins Method for Face to boost microcirculation and encourage lymphatic drainage. Warm product in palms; then gently place on cheeks, forehead, neck and d√©collet√©.Follow by pressing into skin with firm yet gentle pressure. Never tug, pull or stretch. Move outward from cheeks toward ears, from center of forehead to temples, and from jaw down over d√©collet√©.Precautions: Do not use on damaged or broken skin. When using this product keep out of eyes. Rinse with water to remove. Stop use and ask a doctor if rash occurs. Keep out of reach of children. If product is swallowed, get me dical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away. Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure. Apply to all skin exposed to the sun. Children under 6 months: Ask a doctor.Sun Protection Measures: Spending time in the sun in creases your risk of skin cancer and early skin aging. To decrease this risk, regularly use a sunscreen with broad spectrum SPF of 15 or higher and other sun protection measures including: limit time in the sun, especially from 10 a.m. -- 2 p.m. wear long-sleeved shirts, pants, hats and sunglasses reapply at least every 2 hours use a water resistant sun screen if swimming or sweating.IngredientsActive: Avobenzone 3%, Homosalate 9%, Octocrylene 6,5%.Inactive: Aqua/Water/Eau,Glycerin, Butyloctyl Salicylate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Dimethicone,C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate,Cetearyl Alcohol, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Parfum/Fragrance, Cetearyl Glucoside, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Butylene Glycol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Tromethamine, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Disodium EDTA,Tocopheryl Acetate, Xanthan Gum, Dimethiconol, Tocopherol, Anigozanthos Flavidus Extract, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Betaine, Silica, Sorbitol, Diospyros Mespiliformis Leaf Extract, Maltodextrin, Sanicula Europaea Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Kalanchoe Pinnata Leaf Extract, Balanites Roxburghii Seed Oil, Mitracarpus Scaber Extract, Citric Acid, Malpighia Emarginata (Acerola) Seed Extract, Lapsana Communis Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract,Furcellaria Lumbricalis Extract, CI 15985/Yellow 6, Potassium Sorbate, Maris Sal/Sea Salt/Sel Marin.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details

Move outward from cheeks toward ears, from center of forehead to temples, and from jaw down over d√©collet√©.Precautions: Do not use on damaged or broken skin. reviews.headline: A must have!
reviews.comments: Love, love, love this product!

reviews.headline: Love how this makes my skin feel!
reviews.comments: I will buy this again and again. Light fragrance, feels like silk going on and it only takes a dab.  Well worth the cost.  I only wish it had come with a small product paddle to get out of the jar.

reviews.headline: I would not buy this product again
reviews.comments: I used to use this product when it came in a pump  application.  I really dislike it in a jar.  It is too messy.  I wish they would have it in the pump  application again.  I have discontinued using because of the application

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: This product is simply just not for me. The product itself. Not on my skin feels good. Smells good as soon as I put it on my skin I am mediately feel greasy and I already have an oily T-zone. It doesn't seem to really absorb into my skin and has caused quite a few breakouts.

reviews.headline: Nice and creamy
reviews.comments: I love this product and have been using it for about 3 weeks now. It works well with my 40 year old combo skin. I dont mind the scent and it disapates quickly. I would purchase this again. I still use another SPF though, 15 isn't much.

reviews.headline: Awkward jar
reviews.comments: This cream has  a great scent and feel. But it is so hard to control how much I get out each time with the narrow opening and wider base.  I would end up wasting cream in my fingernails!

reviews.headline: Love ‚ù§Ô∏è
reviews.comments: I rotate between this, and an Estee Lauder moisturizer. This is BY FAR my favorite moisturizer. Though there was an adjustment period for my skin (combination/slightly sensitive & acne prone/huge pores). During this adjustment period I did get a blemish or two but I'm also prone to that anyway when trying a new product. However after I was adjusted, I can use it whenever without any issue. It makes my skin SO SOFT and my skin feels hydrated but not greasy. A little goes a long way. The smell is fantastic and not overwhelming. Be sure to learn the correct way to apply this product and you'll have no disappointment.

reviews.headline: Was just ok
reviews.comments: Read raving reviews about it firming the skin and for me‚Ä¶not so much.  Really expensive for what ended up being a basic moisturizer

reviews.headline: Great product to recommend to middle age women.
reviews.comments:
Women with droopy-feeling face - this product is just right for you. Firms and lifts for hours, with
SPF protection too!

reviews.headline: Nice
reviews.comments: I do like that it's not heavy . It has a nice clean smell and is very thick but spreadable . It's a little shiny at first but once soaked in is not . I haven't noticed any affects from using it yet but I have a only had it for about two weeks .

reviews.headline: I have purchased this quite a few times and love it
reviews.comments: This is a great product

reviews.headline: My favorite day cream
reviews.comments: This is my favorite day cream of all time. It's refreshing, non pore blogging, tightens, brightens and there's no heavy perfume that breaks me out.

reviews.headline: The best!
reviews.comments: Really good cream! Recommend this one üëç

reviews.headline: I would definitely buy it again
reviews.comments: I love how it feels and smells

reviews.headline: Drying
reviews.comments: This did not moisturize enough for me in winter. It went on thick and just made my skin feel dry and older. Not good, and the SPF is too low for a day cream. I used the whole jar because it's expensive, but I ended up switching to Aveeno Positively Radiant moisturizer with SPF 30.

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: made my skin so dry. never would buy again

reviews.headline: Perfect day moisturizer
reviews.comments: This is a beautiful lightweight moisturizer + SPF. It sets well under makeup.

reviews.headline: Broke me out
reviews.comments: It was a nice rich moisturizer but the spf broke me out

reviews.headline: Amazing and effective product
reviews.comments: I am a pharmacologist and this is by far one of my most favorite natural and effective moisturizers and I have tried too many to count!

reviews.headline: Not for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I have combination sensitive skin and this moisturizer cause redness and rashes on my checks

faceoff_positive.comments:
I am a skincare junkie and have had a regular skincare routine for probably the last 15 years. I am very particular about the products I use and if I don't see my skin reaping the benefits, out goes the product. So in comes @Clarins, a brand known for having great ingredients with great products. I have never used any of their moisturizers though, until now. Just like many other products I have tried in the name of skincare, I will review it in hopes that it will help others make that important purchase to keep their skin looking years younger!

As many of you already know (and if you don't, you should), your moisturizer is the final step in your skincare routine, but before primer, if you use one. Today, and for the next 3 weeks, Clarins #Extra-Firming #Day #Cream is that final step for me. 

Day 1: It felt pretty thick going on but it spread out very nicely and soaked right in. I always wait a few minutes to let it soak in before putting on primer. Had no issues at all with feeling it on my face. That's a good thing because I'm not a woman who likes to put on moisturizer during my morning skincare routine. I don't like them generally because I usually feel them on my face. I did put a majority of the lotion on my cheeks, where I'm the most dry, and spread it more thinly around the rest of my face. The next day I can honestly say my face look brighter, smoother and tighter.

Day 3: Put on a little too much. Don't know why I thought I needed to try a little more than the first time. A little too much is shown in the Photo. All it takes is a pea sized amount. A little goes a long way.

I went to their website to look at the creams and found some videos about how to apply their lotion, #ClarinsApplicationMethod, and I have been using their method from about Day 5 until now. It helps it to sink in and is a good reminder to get your neck and to be gentle. 

I waited as long as I could to review this moisturizer because I really wanted to know how well it works. I have had absolutely no adverse reactions, only good looking skin. I am not kidding when I say that by the next day of using this moisturizer, my skin was more even toned and brighter. After 2 weeks of using my skin was noticeably smoother. Impressed is an understatement. I have stopped using foundation. I have just been using my favorite primer with a little blush. I am truly impressed and give this product a definite 5 stars. This moisturizer is a staple that I don't want to be without. If one of my friends wanted to bet on this product, with me betting they could change their skin for the better, making it brighter, more even toned and smoother, I would definitely take them up on it. 

#gotitfree #complimentary #sample #review #skincare #Clarins #moisturizer #firming #smoothskin
faceoff_positive.headline: Brightening, smoothing and more

faceoff_negative.comments:
I was given a free  sample of this cream to trial as part of a contest in term for an honest and unbiased review. 
Now that that's out of the way...I managed to squeeze out enough of the Clarins Cream for a full 2 week trial.  I feel this is an ample amount of time to test the effects of skin care products realistically.  I liked some aspects of the cream,  namely the SPF 15 factor of it as well as the richness of the cream itself,  although I did find that repeat application was necessary in the course of the day.  For all those wondering about SPF, it's the stuff more commonly found in your sunscreen products and its what helps to minimize sun damage (wrinkles) on your skin.  Any worthy skin care product contains this,  so Clarins Extra Firming Day Cream scores points for that. 
What I didn't like,  and found very hard to get past,  is the smell.  It was very off putting to me and almost caused me to stop the trial.  After a couple days I started using my normal skin serum first,  which cut down on the smell and made it tolerable.  I would much rather see an unscented line of this cream than subject myself to the smell again. The other thing I really didn't like was that it seemed to wear off quickly.  I started having dry patches of skin a couple hours after applying and had to reapply,  something I don't normally do unless I'm working out and sweating it off. 
I have to say that,  for the money this cream costs,  it's just not worth it.  It was okay,  but so is Olay at a quarter of the cost.  I would not purchase or recommend purchase at the current price.
faceoff_negative.headline: Clarins Extra Firming Day Cream Trial
